body_html:
Hi, thanks for your support.

My machine's spec:
CPU: AMD Threadripper 1900x
GPU: 2x1080Ti
Operate Sys: Window 10
Pytorch is installed in cuda.
Running mode: DataParallel(self.model).to(self.device)

Here is the error code:
File "C:\Users\Chuong\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\pytorch_env\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 336, in __next__ return self._process_next_batch(batch) File "C:\Users\Chuong\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\pytorch_env\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 357, in _process_next_batch raise batch.exc_type(batch.exc_msg) RuntimeError: Traceback (most recent call last): File "C:\Users\Chuong\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\pytorch_env\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 106, in _worker_loop samples = collate_fn([dataset[i] for i in batch_indices]) File "C:\Users\Chuong\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\pytorch_env\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 187, in default_collate return [default_collate(samples) for samples in transposed] File "C:\Users\Chuong\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\pytorch_env\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 187, in <listcomp> return [default_collate(samples) for samples in transposed] File "C:\Users\Chuong\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\pytorch_env\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 162, in default_collate storage = batch[0].storage()._new_shared(numel) File "C:\Users\Chuong\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\pytorch_env\lib\site-packages\torch\storage.py", line 118, in _new_shared return cls._new_using_filename(size) RuntimeError: Couldn't open shared file mapping: <torch_12900_2928290023>, error code: <0>

body:
Hi, thanks for your support. 

My machine's spec:
CPU: AMD Threadripper 1900x
GPU: 2x1080Ti
Operate Sys: Window 10
Pytorch is installed in cuda.
Running mode:  DataParallel(self.model).to(self.device)

Here is the error code: 
`  
  File "C:\Users\Chuong\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\pytorch_env\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 336, in __next__
    return self._process_next_batch(batch)
  File "C:\Users\Chuong\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\pytorch_env\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 357, in _process_next_batch
    raise batch.exc_type(batch.exc_msg)
RuntimeError: Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Users\Chuong\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\pytorch_env\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 106, in _worker_loop
    samples = collate_fn([dataset[i] for i in batch_indices])
  File "C:\Users\Chuong\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\pytorch_env\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 187, in default_collate
    return [default_collate(samples) for samples in transposed]
  File "C:\Users\Chuong\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\pytorch_env\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 187, in <listcomp>
    return [default_collate(samples) for samples in transposed]
  File "C:\Users\Chuong\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\pytorch_env\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 162, in default_collate
    storage = batch[0].storage()._new_shared(numel)
  File "C:\Users\Chuong\AppData\Local\conda\conda\envs\pytorch_env\lib\site-packages\torch\storage.py", line 118, in _new_shared
    return cls._new_using_filename(size)
RuntimeError: Couldn't open shared file mapping: <torch_12900_2928290023>, error code: <0>
`
